page.title: 01CLUNTON AREA
page.content: { The area in the block continues to be much as it has always been, a rural agricultural society. However despite this common background there has over the years been marked and radical changes in it's domestic and social life and activites. The following pages set out to illustrate some of the facets of life lived in a small community at no great distance from places of considerable commercial and industrial influence. The early pages concentrate on general topics. Later pages cover more particular points of interest such as places and buildings. The last few pages are more reflective. We hope that any interested person browsing through these pages will picture life here as it is in 1985.
